Class ModelViewer

public class ModelViewer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

Class that creates a JFrame and Places a panel inside Also contains the algorithms to run the actual collision program

Version:
April 25 2015
Author:
Sam Yu

Constructor Summary
ModelViewer()
          ModelViewer Constructor Creates a new ModelPanel, JFrame and uses methods from ModelPanel class to apply the algorithm to run the collision software
